attributes.action: make csa staff personally accountable for making second families and children suffer.
attributes.additional_details: new family's and step children are made to suffer with extortionate demand's from the csa when they tell you that should pay for your children (i agree we should pay for our kids) but why do the kids in your new family have to suffer because of their mis-calculations and extortionate overcharging which only reaps havoc on new marriages and relationships and a breakdown of communication with your children.
